last_commit_message: Add template management functions for registration, activation, and retrieval  - Implemented sync_register_template and sync_register_template_group for template and group registration. - Added sync_activate_template and sync_deactivate_template for managing template activation status. - Created sync_delete_template for deleting templates or groups. - Introduced sync_get_templates and sync_get_template_groups for fetching templates and groups. - Added sync_is_template_active to check the activation status of a template. - Implemented sync_get_template_data and sync_update_template_data for retrieving and updating template configuration data.

data.pr_title: Adding Template Class and Its Wrapper Funtions
data.pr_desc:
Creating Template Class for easy pre-structure ability, which can be shared too.

## Description

Create a class that can take template based on pre structure and store them as post, and in options table, it store post ID, which templates are active, i can make it is to load data only required,

Fixes: #2 

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [x] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Documentation update

## Related Plugins or Themes

- WiseSync Plugin

## Screenshots (if UI changes)
(Pending...)

_Please attach screenshots/gifs if relevant._

## Checklist

- [ ] I have tested the code on my local WordPress.
- [ ] I have followed WordPress PHPCS rules.
- [ ] I have added tests or explained why not applicable.
- [ ] My code follows the plugin’s coding style.

---

Thanks for contributing to **WiseSync**! ❤️
commits: feat: Add constructor and create_template method to Sync_Template class
feat: Update caching keys for Composer and NPM to include target branch and month
feat: Update build-and-deploy workflow to restrict linting to master branch and enhance PHPCS reporting in PR workflow
feat: Simplify PHPCS workflow by removing caching and push count logic, and enhance report output
fix: Update PR environment link workflow to use head branch for environment URL determination
feat: Enhance PR environment link workflow with detailed environment info and improved comment formatting
fix: Correct typos in Sync_Template class documentation
refactor: Rename build_and_deploy job to build_deploy_and_release and streamline release condition checks
feat: Add developer settings functionality for staging and development environments
feat: Refactor PR data generation to use Python script for improved error handling and flexibility
feat: Add cache IDs for Composer and Node.js steps to improve caching efficiency
fix: Update cache keys for Composer and Node.js to remove date dependency for improved consistency
feat: Add developer settings functionality and enhance PR data generation with additional metadata
feat: Enhance developer settings view with detailed PR information and error handling for JSON file
feat: Add detailed PR information retrieval including file changes, additions, and deletions
fix: Clean up whitespace in build-and-deploy workflow for improved readability
Remove: Test Development Json for local view.
feat: Refactor comment deletion logic to remove all previous environment comments instead of limiting to 5 pushes
feat: Add delay before creating environment link comment to improve user experience
feat: Add deployed check link to environment comment for easier access to deployment settings

Update: Refactor -  Change development setting view page to plugins class

So everything be in one place.

Add template management functions for registration, activation, and retrieval

- Implemented sync_register_template and sync_register_template_group for template and group registration.
- Added sync_activate_template and sync_deactivate_template for managing template activation status.
- Created sync_delete_template for deleting templates or groups.
- Introduced sync_get_templates and sync_get_template_groups for fetching templates and groups.
- Added sync_is_template_active to check the activation status of a template.
- Implemented sync_get_template_data and sync_update_template_data for retrieving and updating template configuration data.
